item.title: What do i do next?
item.dc:creator: @ghostly150 ghostly150
item.description:
@ghostly150 wrote:

OK, I’m trying to add an emote to an item… Here’s what I have so far:

In client.java under public int GetStandAnim(int id)

if(id == 7433) // death cape { return 1501; }

In client.java under public int GetWalkAnim(int id)

if(id == 7433) // death cape { return 1501; }

public int GetRunAnim(int id)

if(id == 7433) // death cape { return 1501; }

And yet it does nothing… Are there any other files or anything I need to edit in addition to this?

Your help is much appreciated…
-Ghostly(150)

Read full topic
